comment.author: 33165999@N07
comment._content: I think the venue must have been the Kilimanjaro District Council hall, which now serves a Moshi Rural District Council's hall. The building is on the Moshi - Himo road at that time at the town's periphery but now its well within Moshi town. I met Chief Marealle in 1993 and 2010 (or was it 2009?), just before his death. We were neighbours in a very loose sense.
